forced_choice.prompt: Your partner pauses before replying to your text.

A.text: I assume they're busy and wait patiently.

B.text: I worry I may have said something wrong.

C.text: I accept it quietly, not wanting to pressure them.

D.text: Once they respond I ignore them.

scenario_choice.prompt: If your partner arrives late for an important dinner, you â€¦

A.text: Tell myself they did what was best, because I trust they care about me.

B.text: Worry I made them upset and apologize more than necessary.

C.text: Test loyalty by pretending not to care.

D.text: Freeze inside, unsure what to say.

likert.text: I feel comfortable depending on others without fear.
